languages.text: {n}Инцендия, погруженная в изучение очередного пергамента, приветствует вас звучным и торжественным голосом:{/n} "{name} фон Валанциус, я рада видеть тебя. В темный час, когда вся мерзость Простора почуяла свободу и вылезла на поверхность, отрадно видеть подле себя верн{mf|ого|ую} союзни{mf|ка|цу}. Вместе мы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}завершили очищение Футфола{/d}, вместе мы вернем порядок во все системы Простора Коронус!"

{n}Incendia, who is engaged in reading one of her many parchments, greets you in a voice that is sonorous and solemn:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, I am pleased to see you. In this dark hour, when all the filth of the Expanse has caught the scent of freedom and crawled to the surface, it is comforting to see a faithful ally at my side. Together, we shall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}finish the purging of Footfall{/d} and restore order to every system in the Expanse!"
languages.original_text: {n}Инцендия, погруженная в изучение очередного пергамента, приветствует вас звучным и торжественным голосом:{/n} "{name} фон Валанциус, я рада видеть тебя. В темный час, когда вся мерзость Простора почуяла свободу и вылезла на поверхность, отрадно видеть подле себя верн{mf|ого|ую} союзни{mf|ка|цу}. Вместе мы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}завершили очищение Футфола{/d}, вместе мы вернем порядок во все системы Простора Коронус!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia, who is engaged in reading one of her many parchments, greets you in a voice that is sonorous and solemn:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, I am pleased to see you. In this dark hour, when all of the filth of the Koronus Expanse has caught the scent of freedom and crawled to the surface, it is comforting to see a faithful ally at my side. Together, we shall finish the culling of Footfall and restore order to every system in the Expanse!"
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia, who is engaged in reading one of her many parchments, greets you in a voice that is sonorous and solemn:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, I am pleased to see you. In this dark hour, when all of the filth of the Koronus Expanse has caught the scent of freedom and crawled to the surface, it is comforting to see a faithful ally at my side. Together, we shall finish the culling of Footfall and restore order to every system in the Expanse!"

In this dark hour, when all the filth of the Expanse has caught the scent of freedom and crawled to the surface, it is comforting to see a faithful ally at my side. Together, we shall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}finish the purging of Footfall{/d} and restore order to every system in the Expanse!"
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅正在阅读着手中长长的卷宗。当她看到你时，她以铿锵而庄严的声音向你问好。{/n}“{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，很高兴见到你。在这个黑暗的时刻，科罗努斯扩区所有污秽之物都嗅到了自由的气息，从阴影里爬了出来。能有你这位忠诚的盟友在我身边，我感到很欣慰。我们必将一起{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}净化落脚港{/d}，将秩序重新带回科罗努斯扩区的各个星系！”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia, who is engaged in reading one of her many parchments, greets you in a voice that is sonorous and solemn:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, I am pleased to see you. In this dark hour, when all the filth of the Expanse has caught the scent of freedom and crawled to the surface, it is comforting to see a faithful ally at my side. Together, we shall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}finish the purging of Footfall{/d} and restore order to every system in the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅正在阅读着手中长长的卷宗。当她看到你时，她以铿锵而庄严的声音向你问好。{/n}“{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，很高兴见到你。在这个黑暗的时刻，科罗努斯扩区所有污秽之物都嗅到了自由的气息，从阴影里爬了出来。能有你这位忠诚的盟友在我身边，我感到很欣慰。我们必将一起净化落脚港，将秩序重新带回科罗努斯扩区的每个星系！”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}大量の羊皮紙を読むのに集中しているインセンディアは、堂々とした厳粛な声で言った。{/n}「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス、お前に会えて光栄だ。この暗黒時代は、エクスパンスのあらゆる汚物が自由の香りを嗅ぎつけ、地表に這い上がってきている。こんな時に信頼できる仲間が側にいるのは安心する。共に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}フットフォールの粛清を終わらせ{/d}、エクスパンスの全ての場所で、秩序をもたらそう！」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia, who is engaged in reading one of her many parchments, greets you in a voice that is sonorous and solemn:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, I am pleased to see you. In this dark hour, when all the filth of the Expanse has caught the scent of freedom and crawled to the surface, it is comforting to see a faithful ally at my side. Together, we shall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}finish the purging of Footfall{/d} and restore order to every system in the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}大量の羊皮紙を読むのに集中しているインセンディアは、堂々とした厳粛な声で言った。{/n}「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス、お前に会えて光栄だ。この暗黒時代は、エクスパンスのあらゆる汚物が自由の香りを嗅ぎつけ、地表に這い上がってきている。こんな時に信頼できる仲間が側にいるのは安心する。共に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}フットフォールの粛清を終わらせ{/d}、エクスパンスの全ての場所で、秩序をもたらそう！」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia, embelesada en la lectura de uno de sus muchos pergaminos, te saluda con voz sonora y solemne:{/n} «{name} von Valancius, me alegro de ver{mf|le|la}. En este momento de oscuridad, en el que toda la inmundicia de la Extensión ha captado el aroma de la libertad y se arrastra hacia la superficie, me reconforta tener {mf|un|una} {mf|aliado|aliada} a mi lado. Junt{mf|os|as} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}acabaremos la purga de Paso{/d} y restauraremos el orden en todos los sistemas de la Extensión».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia, who is engaged in reading one of her many parchments, greets you in a voice that is sonorous and solemn:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, I am pleased to see you. In this dark hour, when all the filth of the Expanse has caught the scent of freedom and crawled to the surface, it is comforting to see a faithful ally at my side. Together, we shall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}finish the purging of Footfall{/d} and restore order to every system in the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia, embelesada en la lectura de uno de sus muchos pergaminos, te saluda con voz sonora y solemne:{/n} «{name} von Valancius, me alegro de ver{mf|le|la}. En este momento de oscuridad, en el que toda la inmundicia de la Extensión ha captado el aroma de la libertad y se arrastra hacia la superficie, me reconforta tener {mf|un|una} {mf|aliado|aliada} a mi lado. Junt{mf|os|as} acabaremos con el sacrificio de Paso y restauraremos el orden en todos los sistemas de la Extensión».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia, die damit beschäftigt ist, eines ihrer vielen Pergamente zu lesen, begrüßt dich in einer sonoren und feierlichen Stimme:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, ich bin erfreut, Euch zu sehen. In dieser dunklen Stunde, wo der gesamte Abschaum der Ausdehnung den Geruch der Freiheit gewittert hat und an die Oberfläche gekrochen ist, ist es tröstlich, {mf|einen treuen Verbündeten|eine treue Verbündete} an meiner Seite zu sehen. Gemeinsam werden wir die {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}Säuberung Footfalls abschließen{/d} und in allen Systemen der Ausdehnung die Ordnung wiederherstellen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia, who is engaged in reading one of her many parchments, greets you in a voice that is sonorous and solemn:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, I am pleased to see you. In this dark hour, when all the filth of the Expanse has caught the scent of freedom and crawled to the surface, it is comforting to see a faithful ally at my side. Together, we shall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}finish the purging of Footfall{/d} and restore order to every system in the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia, die damit beschäftigt ist, eines ihrer vielen Pergamente zu lesen, begrüßt dich in einer sonoren und feierlichen Stimme:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, ich bin erfreut, Euch zu sehen. In dieser dunklen Stunde, wo der gesamte Abschaum der Ausdehnung den Geruch der Freiheit gewittert hat und an die Oberfläche gekrochen ist, ist es tröstlich, {mf|einen treuen Verbündeten|eine treue Verbündete} an meiner Seite zu sehen. Gemeinsam werden wir die Säuberung Footfalls abschließen und in allen Systemen der Ausdehnung die Ordnung wiederherstellen!"
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia, qui est en train de lire l'un de ses nombreux parchemins, vous accueille d'une voix sonore et solennelle :{/n} « {name} von Valancius, je suis ravie de vous voir. En cette heure sombre où toute la vermine des Étendues montre son nez en sentant souffler un vent de liberté, il est réconfortant de voir {mf|un allié|une alliée} fidèle à mes côtés. Ensemble, nous {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}achèverons la purge de Castel{/d} et rétablirons l'ordre dans tous les systèmes du secteur ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia, who is engaged in reading one of her many parchments, greets you in a voice that is sonorous and solemn:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, I am pleased to see you. In this dark hour, when all the filth of the Expanse has caught the scent of freedom and crawled to the surface, it is comforting to see a faithful ally at my side. Together, we shall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}finish the purging of Footfall{/d} and restore order to every system in the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia, qui est en train de lire l'un de ses nombreux parchemins, vous accueille d'une voix sonore et solennelle :{/n} « {name} von Valancius, je suis ravie de vous voir. En cette heure sombre où toute la vermine des Étendues montre son nez en sentant souffler un vent de liberté, il est réconfortant de voir {mf|un allié|une alliée} fidèle à mes côtés. Ensemble, nous achèverons la purification de Castel et rétablirons l'ordre dans tous les systèmes du secteur ! »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Elindeki sayısız parşömenden birini okumaya odaklanmış durumdaki İncendia, seni gür ve heybetli bir sesle selamlıyor.{/n} "{name} von Valancius, seni gördüğüme sevindim. Enginlik'teki tüm pisliklerin özgürlük kokusunu aldığı ve sürünerek yüzeye çıktığı bu karanlık saatte, inançlı bir müttefikimi yanımda görmek gerçekten rahatlatıcı. Birlikte {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}Binliman'ın arındırılmasını tamamlayacak{/d} ve Enginlik'teki her bir sisteme nizam getireceğiz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia, who is engaged in reading one of her many parchments, greets you in a voice that is sonorous and solemn:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, I am pleased to see you. In this dark hour, when all the filth of the Expanse has caught the scent of freedom and crawled to the surface, it is comforting to see a faithful ally at my side. Together, we shall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}finish the purging of Footfall{/d} and restore order to every system in the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sayısız parşömeninden birini okumaya odaklanmış durumdaki İncendia, seni gür ve heybetli bir sesle selamlıyor:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, seni gördüğüme sevindim. Enginlik'teki tüm pisliklerin özgürlük kokusunu aldığı ve sürünerek yüzeye çıktığı bu karanlık saatte, inançlı bir müttefikimi yanımda görmek gerçekten rahatlatıcı. Birlikte {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymHanged}Binliman'ın arındırılmasını tamamlayacak{/d} ve Enginlik'teki her bir sisteme düzen getireceğiz!"
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
